content: This exact thing happened to my dad! The link looked so real. Good on you for not falling for it.
I got one from 'FedEx' last week. Always check the sender's number and the URL carefully. Never click impulsively.
The '.co' instead of '.com' is a classic trick. Thanks for sharing the specifics.
Ugh, the LinkedIn job scams are out of control. Any legit company won't ask for money for training materials. Red flag!
The UPI 'request money' trick is so sneaky. It preys on people not reading the screen properly. Thanks for this reminder.
Happened to me on OLX. The guy was so convincing. I almost approved the request. Always read what you're approving!
